title: Mother and Son Tigers Live Wal
creator: manum app

extendedInfo.description: Mother and Son Tigers is a Live Wallpaper.After you have downloaded and installed it,  You need in order to set it  as a Live Wallpaper:- go to your home screen;- press the menu button on your device;- select "Wallpaper";- select "Live Wallpapers";- search and select for this Live Wallpaper"- select "Settings" to see the settings or select "Set wallpaper" to activate it.System Requirement:any phone that came with Android OS 2.0 or later should work fine. Anything that came with 1.5 / 1.6 may have problemsTags:Mother and Son Tigers Live wallpapers colours orange black white stars eyes grey

reviews.comment: Tigers are very cute ,to much stars though
reviews.author: A Google User
